about_the_game:
Warriors of Thalyrion is a 2D pixelart action game in which you can fight short and fun battles against your friends. As a classic couch game, you play on the same PC as your friend and you share the same game world.

Choose a hero

Before starting the game, you decide on a hero. You can choose between different archetypes and weapons. Do you prefer the sword or the bow? Every character has a weapon for close combat and one for distance fight.

Choose a game mode

PvP: In PvP mode, your teammate is your opponent. Try to achieve the round objectives and score more points than your opponent. Each arena is set up differently and a round is limited in time. With targeted attacks, you can prevent your opponent from collecting points.

Co-op: In the co-op campaign, you play together with your teammate. Complete the round objectives together to reach the next level. A campaign consists of several levels, which are completed with a boss fight.

Solo: You can also play through the campaigns alone. But be aware that it won’t be easy.
